byline.contributor: Maher Sattar contributed reporting from Dhaka, and Nida Najar from New Delhi.

headline.main: American Among Militants Killed by Bangladeshi Police

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Shazad Rouf, a Bangladeshi-born American citizen studying in Dhaka, was linked to the men who attacked the Holey Artisan bakery in July, the authorities say....
lead_paragraph: Shazad Rouf, a Bangladeshi-born American citizen studying in Dhaka, was linked to the men who attacked the Holey Artisan bakery in July, the authorities say.
